comments.author: Loïc
comments.content:
I stayed in that hostel too! 5 years ago, in summer.
The owner, a very old man at that time, used to play a loud (kind of military) song early in the morning to wake up people :)
Have fun on the downhill slopes! After that trip, you will be ready for the Tour de France race in July.
